name: Outer Spaces
description:
Void Sandwich
A model used to explain the theory of parallel/alternate universes. The bun/bread is the universe and the inside on the sandwich is used to describe the void between universes.

But what if they are wrong? Here goes you, main link between two universes: Colorverse and Shapeverse.

What to do with it? Adapt and survive!

You have two game modes: 

  • Replica - where you have the same rotation and position in both worlds
  • Mirror - the name speak itself

For desktop play please use 16:10 resolutions

Good luck and have fun!

Tech:

  • Game Engine: Unity
  • Graphics: Inkscape, Photoshop
  • Audio: Otomata, Audacity
